parameters.name: ClusterType
parameters.description: The type of the cluster. Only Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) clusters are supported.

parameters.name: Identifier
parameters.description: The ID of the cluster that you want to register.

parameters.name: NetworkType
parameters.description:
The network type of the cluster. Valid values:

*   **CLASSIC**: the classic network
*   **VPC**: a virtual private cloud (VPC)
